title: Replace site logo with user-provided logo asset

requirements.text: Replace the siteâ€™s current Meraki logo with the user-uploaded file `logo.png` and ensure the new logo is used everywhere the current logo image is referenced (header, footer, and Open Graph metadata image).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/meraki-logo.dim_1024x1024.png` is replaced/updated to match the uploaded `logo.png` (optimized as needed for web use).
The header logo in `frontend/src/features/landing/HeaderNav.tsx` visually shows the new logo.
The footer logo in `frontend/src/features/landing/Footer.tsx` visually shows the new logo.
The Open Graph image meta tag in `frontend/index.html` continues to point to `/assets/generated/meraki-logo.dim_1024x1024.png` and renders the new logo when the page is shared.
No backend changes are required for this update.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
Serve the logo as a static asset from the frontend (do not serve images from the backend).
nonGoals: Changing brand colors, typography, layout, or copy beyond what is required to swap the logo asset.
Adding new pages or new admin functionality for uploading/changing logos.
